resources.string: This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
The bottom half of the screen is a fragment, containing its own PermissionManager. The fragment is replaced once permission is given.
The app requires permission to access the contacts in order to perform the requested operation
